_source.text: Actually, I have yet to read of a hunting incident resulting in the hunter even being prosecuted and this is something I actually watch for in the news..... ever since that hunter got away with murdering the young lady in her backyard because she had on white mittens and "she should have known better than to wear white mittens in her own backyard during deer hunting season."And
